H0.text: What is the English translation of the place name Las Vegas. The Fountains

H1.text: What is the English translation of the place name Las Vegas. The Plains

H2.text: What is the English translation of the place name Las Vegas. The Valleys

H3.text: What is the English translation of the place name Las Vegas. Meadow

A4.text: The Spanish 'las vegas' or 'the meadows' (more precisely, lower land near a river) in English, was applied to describe the fertile lowlands near the springs.
